did.unittitle: Nora Gorshoff Collection of Paul (Pinya) Passikoff Miscellany
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, telegrams, and newspaper clippings relating to Paul (Pinya) Passikoff.

bioghist.p: Paul (Pinya) Passikoff was born in Chametch, Minsk in 1889. He worked for the United Garment Workers and Amalgamated Clothing Workers of Amreica in the United States. He died in 1939.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of correspondence, telegrams, and newspaper clippings relating to Paul (Pinya) Passikoff.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Nora Gorshoff Collection of Paul (Pinya) Passikoff Miscellany #6020m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
